mapper.insert: insert into orderitem(oid,mid,pid,oquantity, oprice, otime, opaymentmethod) values(#{oid},#{mid},#{pid},#{oquantity},#{oprice},to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd hh24:mi:ss'),#{opaymentmethod})
mapper.select: select o.mid, o.oid, o.oquantity, p.pprice * o.oquantity oprice,p.pthumbnail, p.pname,o.otime from orderitem o inner join product p on o.pid = p.pid where o.mid = #{mid}
